metadata.description: Baseline Pursuit-Evasion configuration matching Hüttenrauch et al. (2019) physical parameters and training setup. Used to validate implementation and establish baseline convergence behavior.
metadata.source: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Swarm Systems (arXiv:1807.06613)
metadata.notes: Physical parameters match Rendezvous baseline (v_max=10.0, world_size=100). Evader uses Hüttenrauch strategy. Reward normalized by obs_radius as per original implementation (r = -min(d_min, obs_radius) / obs_radius).

huttenrauch_baseline_20pursuers_embed64.description: Hüttenrauch baseline: 20 pursuers vs 1 evader, embed_dim=64, seed=0. This is the validation run to confirm convergence.
